data_footnotes:
Water use efficiency: Gross value added in Euro per m³ used water.
• Agriculture, forestry and fishing: Section A according to the classification of economic activities, 2008 edition (NACE Rev. 2).
• MIMEC: Mining and quarrying; manufacturing; electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply; constructios, sections E, G to T according to NACE Rev. 2.
• Services: Sections B, C, D and F according to NACE Rev. 2.
• Data from the water accounts: Every 3 years (from 2010) based on collected values. Interim years estimated retrospectively.
